page.title: 09THE MINISTRY IN IVEGILL
page.content:
Ivegill is now part of a much larger Parochial unit, comprising Skelton and Hutton-in the-Forest, which ironically is 100 square miles of the original Inglewood Forest. The incumbent is based in Skelton, and serves all three parishes, each maintaining its independence of finance and decision- making.
The ministry of the parish is outward looking through an active Sunday School, relations with the Primary School, the Mother's Union and an informal meeting of parishioners and friends to discuss topics of local, national and international interest.
